body_html:
So now (except for the CI), I get a type hint file that

  • let's mypy check all examples for torch and torch.Tensor docstrings except the sparse tensor one (because their examples are broken, but we didn't want to interfere with @yf225 more general efforts). There is a test that tries to call mypy (but I'm not sure whether the CI has it).
  • PyCharm does not indicate errors in the PYI and seems do relatively useful things

All of this is very hacky, and I have quite a few manual annotations.
I did try to sprinkle some more commentary, but will do more.

PyCharm does not indicate errors in the PYI and seems do relatively useful things

All of this is very hacky, and I have quite a few manual annotations.
I did try to sprinkle some more commentary, but will do more.
body:
So now (except for the CI), I get a type hint file that
- let's mypy check all examples for torch and torch.Tensor docstrings except the sparse tensor one (because their examples are broken, but we didn't want to interfere with @yf225 more general efforts). There is a test that tries to call mypy (but I'm not sure whether the CI has it).
- PyCharm does not indicate errors in the PYI and seems do relatively useful things

All of this is very hacky, and I have quite a few manual annotations.
I did try to sprinkle some more commentary, but will do more.
